segments.text: My gaze is drawn to the boy, high up on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching, his arm deep into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see it wobbling from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a daring feat for such a young child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he doesn't lose his balance and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's reaching, he clearly wants those cookies badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems like a lot of effort just for a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end very badly if he tumbles backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His concentration on the jar is absolute, just like the woman's on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just imagine the crash if that stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischievous act is fraught with danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
